column4: the worst thing about ubuntu is updates.. and they suck so bad

1. they are not thoroughly tested.. like a package can come out in one day and night.   2. they show up as 40+ updates all at once, not as soon as one is out.    3. dist upgrades fail most of the time.. like you can't upgrade from 6.10 to 7.10 without issues
out of 30, 3 only? you must be very lucky
